title: People in this game can be so mean and hurt my feelings sometimes tbh
body:
These people on League who tell you off just for having a bad game, I won't name anyone but this jungler in last game in particular really made me feel pretty bad and he said things against christ and the jewish people in game (is hate speech punishable more than swearing?) anyway here is post game lobby
http://imgur.com/kwtl8dC
http://imgur.com/JlghyuP
I sometimes feel like people like this will just continue playing and it makes me feel like League isn't the safe space it should be :/
